fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to Revise. They are reset to their state on Day 1. Converted or transformed players are immune to this effect.
- If you Revise a player the night they would die, their death is delayed by one night and you do not reset them to their Day 1 State. You also reveal 3 random players who did not attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This role counts as role 40 and is considered to have been made in 2020 on the Town of Salem Fandom forum.
